Direction mapping used by nexMap to normalize exits.

## Short to long

| Short | Long |
| --- | --- |
| d | down |
| e | east |
| in | in |
| n | north |
| ne | northeast |
| nw | northwest |
| out | out |
| s | south |
| se | southeast |
| sw | southwest |
| up | up |
| w | west |

| Long | Short |
| --- | --- |
| down | d |
| east | e |
| in | in |
| north | n |
| northeast | ne |
| northwest | nw |
| out | out |
| south | s |
| southeast | se |
| southeastst | se |
| southwest | sw |
| up | up |
| west | w |
